aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The requirements of a customer towards a specific supplier for a specific material. Each material demand is unique by its Customer, Supplier and Material Number.
The demands for a dedicated material in a given time period, distinguished by their demand location and demand category.
Encapsulates the demand series related information.
A time series on a daily basis along a given time period to describe the demand values for this demand series.
A single demand for a day.
Entity for common measurements of an item (mass, count, linear, area, volume, misc) with an unit and a value.
Describes the type of a demand category.
The name describing a demand category.

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: UUID of the Part Type Twin

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The requirements of a customer towards a specific supplier for a specific material. Each material demand is unique by its Customer, Supplier and Material Number.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The requirements of a customer towards a specific supplier for a specific material. Each material demand is unique by its Customer, Supplier and Material Number.
The quantity value associated with the unit.
The unit of an item. Common units may be related to mass, count, linear, area, volume or misc.
Quantity of materials required on a specific day. This demand is not a call-off and should be as close as possible to the actual production program.
A time series on a daily basis along a given time period to describe the demand values for this demand series.
The code identifying a demand category.
The name describing a demand category.
Type of demand for this demand series.

The Business Partner Number Site (BPNS) of the site from where the customer expects the supplier to fulfill the demands of the demand series. The value is used for informational purposes only and is therefore not binding for the supplier.
The Business Partner Number Site (BPNS) of the site at which the customer needs the specified material for this demand series.
Date and time at which the DemandSeries has been updated by the reporting partner's system. Date and time are set according to a timezone.
The demands for a dedicated material in a given time period, distinguished by their demand location and demand category.

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: UUID of the Part Type Twin

aas:langStringPreferredNameTypeIec61360.aas:text: UUID of the Part Type Twin

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Identifier used uniquely to identify part type twin.
